law.catch_line: Articles of amendment shall set forth the amendment and state:...

text.section:
Articles of amendment shall set forth the amendment and state:
That the amendment was advised by the board of directors and approved by the stockholders; or
That the amendment was approved by a majority of the entire board of directors and that:
No stock entitled to be voted on the matter was outstanding or subscribed for at the time of approval; or
The amendment is limited to a change expressly authorized by § 2-105(a)(13) of this title or § 2-605 of this subtitle to be made without action by the stockholders.

If the amendment increases the authorized stock of the corporation, the articles of amendment also shall include:
Both as of immediately before the amendment and as amended:
The total number of shares of stock of all classes which the corporation has authority to issue;
The number of shares of stock of each class;
The par value of the shares of stock of each class or a statement that the shares are without par value; and
If there are any shares of stock with par value, the aggregate par value of all the shares of all classes; and
If the shares are divided into classes:
A description, as amended, of each class, including the preferences, conversion and other rights, voting powers, restrictions, limitations as to dividends, qualifications, and terms and conditions of redemption; or
A statement that the information required by item (i) of this item was not changed by the amendment.
